headline: Best Buy brings shoppers last-minute magic with savings, gifts and fast fulfillment
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, December 10, 2025--Some holiday traditions never change: decorating the house, baking cookies, and of course, the inevitable last-minute gift run. This year, Best Buy has everything you need for last-minute shopping and is making it easier than ever to check off your holiday list in one spot.

headline: The Bull Case For Best Buy (BBY) Could Change Following Addition Of Riot Games CEO To Board
summary: Best Buy Co., Inc. has added Dylan Jadeja, chief executive officer of Riot Games and former Goldman Sachs consumer retail leader, to its Board of Directors, with the appointment now in effect. By bringing in a gaming and digital content veteran with deep finance and operations experience, Best Buy is signaling a stronger push into entertainment-driven technology and online engagement. Now we’ll examine how adding a gaming and digital content expert to the board may influence Best Buy’s...

headline: Telsey Advisory Highlights Best Buy’s (BBY) Strength in Consumer Electronics Market
summary: Best Buy Co., Inc. (NYSE:BBY) is included among the 15 Dividend Stocks Paying 4%+ Yield in 2025. On November 26, Telsey Advisory raised its price target on Best Buy Co., Inc. (NYSE:BBY) to $95 from $90, while keeping an Outperform rating on the stock. The firm appreciated the company’s execution and its growing market share […]
